task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: This section demonstrates how to use the subtraction feature of The Smart Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you need to know what subtraction is.

result.p: The result of the subtraction is displayed.

example.p: If you want to subtract 30 from 45, the equation will look like: 45-30=15. You enter 45, select minus, enter 30, and then select equal. The result 15 appears on the screen.
